snippet.title: Half-Life: Year of the Dragon - Exclusive Office Complex Gameplay
snippet.description:
Half-Life: Year of the Dragon is a mod for the original Half-Life that puts Spyro, our beloved purple dragon, into the depths of the Black Mesa Research Facility with all of his move set and wits.

The creator of the mod, Magic Nipples, decided to share some exclusive gameplay with us from the modified Office Complex chapter to upload. Enjoy!

Visit the official Half-Life: Year of the Dragon website:
https://hlyotd.com/

Visit Half-Life: Year of the Dragon on ModDB:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/year-of-the-dragon

Follow Magic Nipples on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Magic_Nipples

--------------
Subscribe for more Half-Life goodness.
